page.title: 14Acton Trussell shop.
page.content: This local shop provides a community service. The shopkeeper will deliver food and other requirements to the elderly in the village, to outlying farm and houses, to people who are ill or without a car. Many of the locals travel out of the village for goods and this shop only provides small necessities. Most tend to go to Stafford to either Kwiksave or Sainsbury's. The shop in the village is used most often for its Post Office facilities and for newspapers. The Post Office was shut down for a period of six months but the locals objected and it was reopened. The shopkeeper employs two part time assistants to help him with his work.
